creator: Stephan.Strittmatter@gmx.de
text:
To delete .svn-directories, there is a wrong example in the delete-task
description at [1].
I corrected it at [2], probably this could be updated in the documentation also.

[1] http://ant.apache.org/manual/CoreTasks/delete.html
[2] http://jroller.com/page/stritti?entry=delete_svn_directories_using_an

creator: jan@materne.de
text: Now I have rechecked that. Ok - I changed that. Thanks.
